stories.text:
It was the best of times: Science™ delivered in record time a perfect vaccine for a newly-emerged super-virus. Millions promptly lined up to get protected from the super-virus. The go-alongs got their jabs as the months progressed not because they were worried about the super-virus, but to do their part in getting the government to let life get back to normal.

It was the worst of times: a vocal minority refuses to get vaccinated, and are successfully throwing their sabo [0] into the public health machine. Some of those who are In Rebellion Against Science™ consist of airline pilots, nuclear scientists, soldiers, police officers, teachers, doctors and other medical workers, people who've already recovered from COVID-19, protestors against 'vaccine passports', etc.

I proudly count myself among the vocal minority. I suspect I have an auto-immune condition already, think the jab could possibly finish me off, and have obtained the anti-serotonin drug cyproheptadine in case I happen to catch SARS-CoV-2.

Got myself another -4 HN comment recently by trying and failing to preach my own understanding of settled science. I noticed a single upvote before a brigade of Dark Helmet Downvoters [1] arrived.

Decades ago scientists figured out that excess oxygen is toxic & invasive ventilation harms lungs [2]. There is a simple antidote for oxygen toxicity. While ventilators are sometimes useful, they are known to not help with pneumonia. There would've been no need to worry about SARS-CoV-2 if Medicine™ hadn't forgotten best practices for patients whose oxygen levels are low.

I am submitting this as a Poll so the silent minority can anonymously share what they really think, without risking getting downvoted.

[0] Sabo/Sabotage & Star Trek VI - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKLIivrA3g0

[1] Space Balls reference - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o8XddGIaLaU

[2] The Folly of Medical Hyperventilation - https://www.taxiwars.org/2021/06/folly-medical-hyperventilation.html
